name: iClub Manager 2
description:
iCLUB MANAGER IS BACK!
Following the success of the first version, iClub Manager 2 arrives with hundreds of new features while maintaining an intuitive and easy to use interface. Now iCM2 is one of the most complete, challenging and addictive football manager games in the market.

BECOME A FOOTBALL MANAGER
In iClub Manager 2 you will become a manager responsible for overseeing all aspects of a football club. You will start from the fifth division and you will have to fulfill the objectives. If you meet the goals, the teams will offer you to continue at the helm, or else they will fire you.

MORE COMPETITIONS, MORE TEAMS, MORE PLAYERS!
Now you can run up to 400 teams from 4 countries. More than 10,000 players without real names, but fully customizable with age, physical and psychological parameters, contracts, etc. Get ready because, also, you will have to fight for new competitions: 4 leagues, 4 Cups and one Champions Cup.

MULTIPLAYER, MULTIPLAYER, MULTIPLAYER!
Tell all your friends because in iClub Manager 2 you will be able to play games in real time with turns with up to 8 players on one device or up to 4 players via Game Center. Now we will know who is the best manager!

INTUITIVE, FAST, ADDICTIVE!
This time, iCM2 is more complete, but still it is just as intuitive and quick as before... and much, much more addictive. It is a football manager game carefully designed for phones and tablets.

NEW MATCH MODE
You can play the matches directly in Result mode or you can follow them instantly and make substitutions or tactical changes in the Minute-by-minute mode.

NEW TRANSFER MARKET
It is not enough to pay the price of a player, now you have to worry about his wage and his years of contract. Also, you can loan them, you can sign up them for the next season or you can fire them. You have all the control.

MORE NEWS
And that's not all. TV Offers, Merchandising, Training, and much more to discover.

FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE
iCM2 is again fully customizable. Leagues, teams, players... everything as you like. And of course, you can share your custom databases through iTunes.

GAME CENTER!
Again, with each match in iCM2 you will earn points for the leaderboards in Game Center. Not to mention, you have new achievements to earn.
